title: Physical Education Curriculum & Instruction
description: Comprehensive physical education curriculum materials including unit presentations, classroom management resources, assessments, and planning documents. Designed for high school physical education programs with emphasis on fitness, team sports, and student engagement.

projects.title: Physical Education Unit Presentations
projects.description: Complete set of unit presentations covering fitness, flexibility, strength, agility, and team sports. Each presentation includes learning objectives, instructional content, and activity guidelines.
learningObjectives: Apply safety practices in physical activity

presentations.title: Agility Training
presentations.description: Agility training fundamentals and drills for developing quick movement and coordination.

presentations.title: Basketball 101
presentations.description: Introduction to basketball fundamentals including rules, skills, and gameplay.

presentations.title: Circuit Training Education
presentations.description: Comprehensive circuit training program with station-based exercises and progression guidelines.

presentations.title: Circuit Training Station Names
presentations.description: Visual guide for circuit training station organization and naming conventions.

presentations.title: Core Strength Training
presentations.description: Core strengthening exercises and progression for developing abdominal and back muscles.

presentations.title: Dynamic Stretching
presentations.description: Dynamic warm-up stretches and mobility exercises for pre-activity preparation.

presentations.title: Fitness Unit
presentations.description: Comprehensive fitness unit covering cardiovascular, muscular, and flexibility components.

presentations.title: Flexibility Unit
presentations.description: Flexibility training principles, static and dynamic stretching techniques.

presentations.title: Introductory Vocabulary
presentations.description: Essential physical education terminology and concepts for new students.

presentations.title: Jump Rope Skills
presentations.description: Jump rope techniques, progressions, and cardiovascular fitness applications.

presentations.title: Static Stretching
presentations.description: Static stretching techniques for post-activity cool-down and flexibility maintenance.

presentations.title: Team Sports Introduction
presentations.description: Introduction to team sports concepts, rules, and cooperative play.

presentations.title: Volleyball 101
presentations.description: Volleyball fundamentals including serving, passing, setting, and basic gameplay.

projects.title: Classroom Management & Community Building
projects.description: Presentations focused on establishing classroom expectations, building community, and maintaining a positive learning environment in physical education settings.
learningObjectives: Build positive relationships with peers and teacher
Practice respectful behavior in PE settings

presentations.title: Classroom Expectation Quiz
presentations.description: Interactive quiz format for reviewing classroom expectations and procedures.

presentations.title: Gym Housekeeping
presentations.description: Guidelines for maintaining gym equipment and facilities.

presentations.title: Respect
presentations.description: Presentation on respect, sportsmanship, and positive behavior in PE.

presentations.title: Getting to Know Each Other
presentations.description: Icebreaker activities for building classroom community.

presentations.title: Getting to Know Each Other II
presentations.description: Continued community-building activities and relationship development.

presentations.title: Getting to Know Each Other III
presentations.description: Advanced community-building and team-building exercises.

projects.title: Physical Education Assessments
projects.description: Assessment materials including review presentations and evaluation tools for tracking student progress and understanding.
learningObjectives: Assess student understanding of PE concepts

presentations.title: Week 9 Review
presentations.description: Comprehensive review presentation for Week 9 material. Also available in PDF format for easy distribution.

projects.title: Curriculum Planning Documents
projects.description: Semester planning and weekly lesson plan templates for organizing and structuring physical education curriculum.
projects.targetAudience: Physical education teachers and curriculum coordinators

files.title: Semester Agenda - Physical Education
files.description: Complete semester agenda outlining units, topics, and pacing for physical education curriculum.

files.title: Weekly Lesson Plan Template
files.description: Template for weekly lesson planning in physical education, including objectives, activities, and assessments.

projects.title: Obstacle Course Layout
projects.description: Visual layout diagram for obstacle course setup in physical education. Demonstrates spatial organization and equipment placement for effective instruction.
